text:
I had that issue two weeks ago, after digging some time I think its related with the local data they save for the DM (like tabs you have opened, not published changes etc.) At some point it can breaks which generate that issue.
So yes, the solution is remove that data, dunno how to reproduce tho

<@UD53A9UUR> thanks. For some reason though can't get the footer module to align in the same way it is here on this page with the images and content properly formatted.I can't also seem to get the color to be the same Any thoughts on this?I been targeting the footer but no luck...

How it should look in the footer:<http://zonnefabriek.wezz.io/>
How it currently looks in the footer: <https://info.zonnefabriek.nl/-temporary-slug-8b8fe2c2-648f-43fa-bf98-df44318932b8?hs_preview=BLACTEjh-9100464294>
<@UEZJ74UN8>, ```.footer-container-wrapper{#eeeeee}``` although, looks like you are using a slightly different shade on your landing page
if this is a drag and drop template, i would separate the 3 items in the footer into thirds
